name: Electabuzz
flavorText:
Normally found
near power plants,
they can wander away and cause
major blackouts
in cities.

previous.name: Jynx
previous.flavorText:
It seductively
wiggles its hips
as it walks. It can cause people
to dance in
unison with it.

next.name: Magmar
next.flavorText:
Its body always
burns with an
orange glow that enables it to
hide perfectly
among flames.

pokemon.name: Elekid
pokemon.flavorText:
It rotates its
arms to generate
electricity, but it tires easily,
so it charges up
only a little bit.

pokemon.name: Electabuzz
pokemon.flavorText:
Normally found
near power plants,
they can wander away and cause
major blackouts
in cities.

pokemon.name: Electivire
pokemon.flavorText:
As its electric charge amplifies,
blue sparks begin to crackle between
its horns.
